title: gurupara guhanE
sahitya:
gurupara guhanE aruL taruvAyE kurai tavirndunadaDi perep-purivAyE


anupallavi

  murugA kumarA mukkaNNan udaviya karuNAnidhiyE karaiyilA inbamE


caraNam    aghaviruL mAittiDum arumai shuDarE asurarai vIzhttiDum aruntiral vElA 
pughavoru gatiyilEn puNNiyam ariyEn pongumun anbutAn pughalena vanduLLEn
